main event: The observer reported seeing a star-like white light, similar to a satellite, that moved at a fairly fast rate, but its direction and duration were not given.
interesting points: The object was described as a star-like white light, similar to a satellite.
The object moved at a fairly fast rate, but its direction and duration were not provided.
The report states that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
The observer was requested to complete a questionnaire to provide more details about the sighting.
The Air Force advised the observer to report any future sightings promptly to the nearest Air Force base for investigation.
sighted object: star-like white light, similar to a satellite
